item.title: Begian parliamentarians twitter accounts
item.description: Now that we can scrape the names of the parlemaintarians of the 54th legistlature, we can try to find their Twitter accounts too. Letâ€™s start by reconstruct the list. How many do we have? nrow(table) ## [1] 179 Ok, did not loose any along the way. So now there is a dataframe with the last name and first name of the 179 persons who wo seated in the 54th legislature (by now there will be no changes).
